description: DOCUMENTS AND DRAWINGS ARE NOT AVAILABLE ELECTRONICALLY FOR THIS APPLICATION. PLEASE CALL THE CASE OFFICER. Proposed internal alterations following approval of listed building consent LB/23/07421 to comprise: Lower Ground Floor: 1. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.20 Shower Room. 2. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.01 Gym. 3. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.17 Storage. Ground Floor: No Changes. First Floor: 1. Minor changes to internal door opening into F.08 En-Suite 02. Second Floor: 1. Layout change in Guest Suite 3 and En-Suite 5. Third Floor: 1. Location of door opening changed in T.01 Staff Bedroom. 2. Minor changes to internal door openings into T.06 Powder Room. 3. Configuration of joinery and door openings into T.08 Storage. 4. Configuration of joinery and door openings into T.09 Storage.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_: LB/23/07421 for same description of development approved February 2024.  Application is for minor internal changes to the approved layouts.
